Text:
Thank you. 
Wow! This was hard to watch but I'm glad I did.
Thank you for uploading. Never thought I'd find it here.

I met him myself in Cameroon and he invited me for one of his crusades in which I got saved by the grace of our Lord Jesus. His conversion is real. I want to buy the movie but i do not have it yet in my country but when I do I will Buy it. Just wanted to let you guys know he is real.

Awesome upload. And seeing really fast. Thank you so much for putting this on here.

Also everyone if this interests you, VICE magazine did a video about these things going on in Liberia... Check it out if you want. It's a great video.

Here is the link:
http://www.vice.com/the-vice-guide-to-travel/the-vice-guide-to-liberia-1
